## findNodeAtStartOfDoc variable

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> use `doc.firstChild` instead
> 

Finds the node at the start of the prosemirror.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findNodeAtStartOfDoc: (doc: import("prosemirror-model").Node<any>) => FindProsemirrorNodeResult<any>
```
